newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - USCS INT'L CUT TO HOLD.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - USCS INT'L CUT TO HOLD.

text.p: Jeffries & Co said it downgraded USCS International Inc to hold from buy.

-- On Monday, USCS said it was the losing party in a highly competitive bid for Tele-Communications Inc's Summitrak BACC platform and TCI's billing software business. CSG Systems International Inc beat USCS on the bid.
-- said TCI accounted for 21 percent of USCS's 1996 revenue base, which contributed about $0.16 a share in earnings. USCS posted $0.64 a share in total earnings in 1996.
-- said still believes USCS remains a leader in its industry and will have ample opportunities for growth.
-- sees 21 percent year-over-year earnings per share growth in 1998.
